projects.name: Voice Assistant
projects.description: A Python-based voice assistant that opens websites, sends emails, plays music, fetches news and weather, and interacts with OpenAI for responses. Supports system controls, WhatsApp messaging, and is customizable.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: A Python Snake game built with pygame where players control a snake to collect food and grow without hitting boundaries. Features score tracking, restart option, and simple arrow key controls.

projects.name: Banking System
projects.description: A C language-based banking system allowing users to create accounts, deposit, withdraw, and check balances with a command-line interface.

projects.name:
Department-management-
System
projects.description: A Python-based library management system using SQLite and Tkinter, enabling book additions, removals, and lending through a simple interface.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio website using Flask, showcasing skills, projects, and contact information in an organized format.

projects.name: Server Chat System
projects.description: A simple server-based chatting system developed for secure and efficient communication over a network.
